headline: Chief Information Officer at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: Over 36 years experience in acquisition, deployment, operations and maintenance of technology, more than 25 years of which in leadership roles and 10 years as a Federal Senior Executive.

positions.description: Built and oversaw an $800M/year fee-for-service organization delivering IT infrastructure services across all elements of the Department of Homeland Security.
positions.title: Executive Director, IT Services Office

positions.description: Served as executive agent for DHS data center and network consolidation efforts.  Led CBP's Tactical Communication Modernization Project and CBP IT infrastructure projects such as E-mail modernization and Border Patrol Network Modernization.
positions.title: Director, Enterprise Infrastructure Projects Office

positions.description: Directed a workforce of more than 600 Government and contractor personnel.  Managed computer center operations, call center, network operations, configuration management and nationwide field support.
positions.title: Director, Systems Operations Branch

positions.description: Led group specializing in electronic data interchange, message oriented middleware and mainframe database software.  Developed and maintained software for import, export and enforcement systems.
positions.title: Middleware Team Lead

positions.description: Program Executive Office for IT - Directed the deployment of the new Navy Standard Integrated Personnel System to all Navy units afloat and ashore worldwide.
positions.title: Implementation Manager

positions.description: Commander, Naval Reserve Force - Managed nationwide network and call center operations, data center operations, system administration, HQ desktop support and Defense Megacenter storefront operations.
positions.title: Director, Client-Server Divsion

positions.description: Commander, Naval Reserve Force - Established the Naval Reserve Force cybersecurity program and workforce.  Executed a risk management program resulting in first accreditation of all Headquarters systems.  Developed and implemented Force-wide security polices.  Adjunct member of Office of Inspector General, conducting cybersecurity inspections of Naval Reserve units nationwide.
positions.title: Automated Information Systems Security Officer

positions.description: Tactical System Support Activity - Senior member of VAX/VMS system administration team, managing the software development environment for the Position Location Reporting System.
positions.title: System Programmer

positions.description: Naval Ocean Systems Center - Provided hardware and system administration support to a research and development organization specializing in signal collection and analysis.
positions.title: Electronics Technician

positions.description: Naval Sea Support Center, Pacific - Third tier field support expert for Seasparrow missile system and Vertical Launching System.
positions.title: Electronics Technician

positions.description: Performed maintenance on computer and radar components of the Seasparrow missile system, advanced to lead technician for Harpoon cruise missile system, finally serving as senior technician for all shipboard missile system components.
positions.title: Fire Control Technician - Leading Petty Officer
